text: Bad Medicine is a 1985 American comedy movie directed by Harvey Miller and starring Steve Guttenberg, Alan Arkin, Julie Hagerty, Bill Macy. It was based on the novel Calling Dr. Horowitz by Steve Horowitz. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Madrid
title: Bad Medicine (movie)
